sentence: Party lawmakers who voted for Trump's subsequent impeachment now face primary challenges, and one of the former president's most outspoken GOP critics, Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming, was forced out of her position in caucus leadership.
author: Chris Megerian
title: The battle for the Capitol ended. The war for democracy continues

title: The Hill's Morning Report - Presented by Facebook - Democrats see victory in a voting rights defeat

sentence: The actions of Rep. Matt Gaetz (R-Fla.) and Rep. Mo Brooks (R-Ala.) in particular had crossed a line, McCarthy suggested, noting that Brooks used incendiary language during a Jan. 6 speech and that Gaetz had singled out Rep. Liz Cheney (R-Wyo.)
title: Post Politics Now McCarthy faces House Republicans in wake of audio tape leak
